title: Fresh Grocer on Penn's campus could be replaced by an Acme
title_page: Fresh Grocer on Penn's campus could be replaced by an Acme
maintext:
By Staff
The Fresh Grocer, known to students on campus as “FroGro,” might be on its way out at Penn.
According to a report by the Daily Pennsylvanian, the University of Pennsylvania is contesting Fresh Grocer’s right to renew its lease, which would require the chain to vacate the 40th and Walnut location it has operated at since the spring of 2001.
Continue reading on Philly.com
http://www.philly.com/philly/blogs/real-time/Fresh-Grocer-Penn-campus-could-be-replaced-by-Acme.html
